√styā 'stiffen'

present: [4.] styāyate etc.  

[perfect: tastyau  styāyāt  styeyāt  astyāsīt  styāsyati  styātā  ]

verbal: styāna  stīta  stīma  -styā́ya  

derivatives: stíyā  -styāya C.  -styāyana C.  stīmá AV.  -stīmin AV.B.  

The last two derivatives perhaps rather from √stim/stīm (or this from them).
